title: Fourth Floor (Part 2)
body:
Fourth Floor (Part 2)

When the lightning arrow went inside the lake, nothing happened for the first few seconds. But after a few seconds, the water of the lake started becoming turbulent.

Bubbles started to come out from all over the lake and the next second...

... Crackle!

A crackling sound rang out throughout the area and a storm of lightning engulfed the entire lake.

Screams and Roars of water monsters echoed out everywhere and they started to jump out of the water, trying to escape from the assault of lightning.

Although the monsters jumped out of the water, it was still useless because their bodies were already covered in the conceptual energy of the lightning and they were completely helpless against it.

Within seconds, the bodies of S rank monsters began floating above the lake and a dense aura of death engulfed the fourth floor. But it did not last long because all the dead bodies soon disappeared and were absorbed by the Tower Of Ascension.
